Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically dismounts you when casting\na spell or selecting a flight path") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.Dismount) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically declines duels") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.DuelDecline) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically filters only available
skills at a trainer
Click anywhere outside of the window
to show all skills") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.FilterAvailable) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically skip gossip when talking to\nvendors/trainers/flight masters unless\nSHIFT is held to override") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.SkipGossip) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically enables enemy nameplates\nwhen in combat and disables them when\nout of combat") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.Nameplates) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically repairs all items\nwhen talking to a merchant") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.Repair) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Automatically sells grey items\nwhen talking to a merchant") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.SellJunk) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Remove unneeded channel titles like\n[GUILD], [PARTY], [RAID]") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.ChatClean) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Mousewheel scrolling of chat windows\nHold shift to quickly scroll to the top\nor bottom of the chat window") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.ChatScroll) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Shorten public channel names\nto [1.], [2.], etc...") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.ShortenChannelNames) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Shift right click to search for item\nShift right click to split stacks\nRight click to sell item") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.AuctionHouse) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Right Click to collect mail\nShift Right Click to quickly send items\nand save mail recipient") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.MailBox) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Right click on portrait or name\nin chat for extended options\nRequires reload to take effect") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.PlayerLink) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Right click to trade item") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.Trade) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Filters out red error messages on-screen\nUse /ef for more options") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.ErrorFilter) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Hold shift to see currently equipped items") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.EquipCompare) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Turns the minimap button on or off") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.MinimapButton) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Moves the loot window under the cursor\nRequires restart if disabled") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.QuickLoot) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Fades out skills that are unavailable") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.RangeColor) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Improves text on unit frames and also\nshows useful info on the target frame") GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnShow: if (AutoMate.UnitFrames) then this:SetChecked(1) else this:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:AddLine("AutoMate") GameTooltip:AddLine("Left click to show options") GameTooltip:AddLine("Right click to drag this button") GameTooltip:Show()
AddOns_TitleButton_OnEnter()

FontString.name: $parent_Dec1
FontString.text: Type a new name into the textbox,

FontString.name: $parent_Dec2
FontString.text: press 'Save' to save a new profile.

Scripts.OnShow: AddOns_Profiles_ProfilesDropDown_OnLoad()

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip("Accept", 1.0, 1.0, 1.0,"Warning! Some UI's need a restart of WOW in order to work properly!", 1)
